Name: Swordfish Features Registry
Description: This registry defines the Swordfish features.

SNIA.Swordfish.Discovery.Description: Supports discovery of resources in a service-based Swordfish system.

SNIA.Swordfish.EventNotification.Description: Supports the Swordfish Event Notification Feature defined in SwordfishEventNotification.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.IOPerformance.Description: Supports the Swordfish Block IOPerformance Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.Provisioning.Description: Supports the Block Provisioning Feature in a service-based Swordfish system.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.LocalReplication.Description: Supports the local replication for block storage Feature in a service-based Swordfish system.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.RemoteReplication.Description: Supports the remote replication for block storage Feature in a service-based Swordfish system.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.MappingMasking.Description: Supports the Swordfish Block Mapping and Masking Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.CapacityManagement.Description: Supports the Swordfish Block Capacity Management Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.File.Provisioning.Description: Supports the File Provisioning Feature in a service-based Swordfish system.

SNIA.Swordfish.File.CapacityManagement.Description: Supports the Swordfish File Capacity Management Feature.
